name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Integration Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across various sectors, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python** and **JavaScript**, with extensive use of **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration of systems. Demonstrated expertise in AI/ML technologies, particularly in **Conversational AI** and **NLP**, to enhance user interaction and automating processes.

Skilled in utilizing **Salesforce**, **ServiceNow**, and **MSDynamics** for CRM integration, optimizing customer engagement and service delivery. Proven success in managing project delivery with a strong focus on stakeholder communication and customer-facing engineering roles. Adept at implementing modern communication solutions through **VoIP**, **Video Conferencing**, and **8x8 APIs**. 

Strong foundation in deploying applications on cloud platforms with a commitment to compliance-driven development and operational efficiency.
